name: Hekate
description: Hekate is a platform game where the player will travel through a journey with a young small girl who has one mission: to carry a fire in her hand to the end of the journey. The game focuses on story and interaction along her journey. The player will face different situations where they can make use of the fire for themselves and others, at the same time learn about the story about the world and the girl’s journey. Maybe everything is not like what it seems.
